references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational denoising diffusion probabilistic models upon which SANA-Sprint is built.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper presents score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations which inspires continuous-time diffusion models used in SANA-Sprint.

references.paper_title: Simplifying, stabilizing and scaling continuous-time consistency models
references.reason: This paper presents the continuous-time consistency models (sCM) method upon which SANA-Sprint's method for consistency distillation is based.
This paper introduces consistency models, enabling single-step generation in diffusion models, which SANA-Sprint builds upon to achieve ultra-fast text-to-image generation.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Latent Diffusion Models, enabling high-resolution image synthesis that has inspired follow up works used in SANA-Sprint.
